sentences.sContent: This is the common fate of mortal men, useless it is to repine .
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the common fate of mortal men, useless it is to repine .
sentences.sCn: 这是凡人的共同命运，抱怨也没有用。

remMethod.val: re + pine (憔悴) → 因苦恼、 不满而憔悴

trans.tranOther: to be fretful or low-spirited through discontent
